title: 1) Ministry From Spring Harvest - Chapter 1
description: The key to this passage, and its application, is the fact that Daniel “resolved”. Verwer focuses on God’s providence, and Daniel’s resolve, holiness and perseverance. The holiness must be presented in a culturally-contextualized way so as to properly demonstrate a clear message. "Theological tidbits" and extremism must be avoided to keep them out of the way of the message.
